players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I am innocent and need your help"
Diana: "Let's all work together to uncover the truth. I, as the mafioso, have my reasons for actions but we need to focus on finding out who else might be involved or lying."
You: "I will continue to investigate and gather more information. I need everyone's help in this."
Charlie: "I will support Diana's plan and help Bob in his investigation. We need to be cautious and gather evidence before making any accusations."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
